text: Stuart M. Rosen (June 26, 1939 â€“ August 4, 2019) was an American voice director and actor. He was born in Joliet, Illinois. He was best known for directing MASK, Hulk Hogan's Rock 'n' Wrestling, the first episodes of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, The Legend of Prince Valiant, Super Secret Secret Squirrel, 2 Stupid Dogs, and Biker Mice from Mars. An actor, he was best known for as the voice of the storyteller in Fraggle Rock: The Animated Series. Rosen died on August 4, 2019 in Los Alamitos, California, at the age of 80, from cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American television directors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American voice actors Category:American puppeteers Category:American television writers Category:Writers from Joliet, Illinois Category:Writers from California Category:Actors from California Category:Actors from Joliet, Illinois
title: Stu Rosen
